short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A beta-version of a simple interactive tool to track your time and get statistics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nathaniel Branden, an American psychotherapist known for his work on self-esteem, once said: "The first step towards change is awareness".

This extension is a tool to understand what your time is really spent on.  It's best suited for tracking a relatively small number of tasks, so try to group all your activities and end up with 5-10 tasks you want to track daily. Track regularly for a week and then check the stats. You may be surprised to see the distribution!

Features:
 - automatically syncs between different machines (in case you sign in to Chrome)
 - access to exactly the same UI from the web in case you use a device like iPad or Android tablet:
        https://controlfreaktracker.appspot.com/main.html
